section.title: Rivet_Script
section.para:
Tcl script that is run when each interpreter is initialized. script is an actual Tcl script, so to run a file, you would do:
Rivet_Script GlobalInitScript "source /var/www/foobar.tcl"
Script to be evaluated when each Apache child process is initialized. This is the recommended place to load modules.
Script to be evaluated when each Apache child process exits.
Script to be evaluated before each server parsed (.rvt) page.
Script to be called after each server parsed (.rvt) page.
This code is called in place of the standard 'error' pages generated for Rivet. This directive may be useful if you have sensitive logic that you wish to protect.
